name: The Wedding (ASLAN)
description:
Whoever said you can't have your cake and eat it too has clearly never been a terrifying slime monster on her wedding day. You got the perfect flowers, the perfect dress, and the perfect groom. Run through this game absorbing your new hubby and all your wedding guests. Nothing encapsulates the idea of marriage quite like absorbing your partner's family so you'll all be together until the end of time, right? 

But watch out for those tricky peanuts, apparently your wedding planner didn't get the memo that you're deathly allergic.

This game was made with help with Amber Dickinson.
